init_eqs_str: (function(){a['oldq4'] = 0; a['counter'] = 0; a['meanbass_att'] = 0; a['q1'] = 0; a['counter2'] = 0; a['lastbeat'] = 0; a['beatrate'] = 0; a['peakbass_att'] = 0; a['countertime'] = 0; a['q4'] = 0; a['oldq3'] = 0; a['volume'] = 0; a['beat'] = 0; a['q3'] = 0;}());
